lu.uni.geko.common
Class AbstractModelTransformer<T>

java.lang.Object
  lu.uni.geko.common.AbstractModelTransformer<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the return type of the transformation
Direct Known Subclasses:
MMTransformer, Pc2AvMapResolver, PcRulesGenerator, Weaver
public abstract class AbstractModelTransformer<T>
extends Object

A convenience abstract class to be extended by clients that transform a model and need a console and a URI.

Field Summary

          Fast access to the console used for displaying information to the user.
